scripts.lint:web-ext: npm run manifest:firefox && npx web-ext lint --source-dir ./src/ --ignore-files dist/**
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:web-ext
scripts.manifest:chrome: npx json-merger -p --am concat -o src/manifest.json manifest.json manifest-chrome.json
scripts.manifest:firefox: npx json-merger -p --am concat -o src/manifest.json manifest.json manifest-firefox.json
scripts.build:chrome: npm run manifest:chrome && npx web-ext build -n {name}-chrome-{version}.zip -o -s src
scripts.build:firefox: npm run manifest:firefox && npx web-ext build -n {name}-firefox-{version}.zip -o -s src
scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
